data.title: A product design agency is too costly for me
data.html_title: Cost-Efficiency in Design: A Product Agency's Perspective - Glow Team
data.html_description: Glow Team's blog discusses the cost-benefit analysis of hiring a product design agency versus individual freelancers.
data.description: “Ok, this will be a text where you try to reason big budgets of your agency” — you might have thought. And you are correct but please, let…

paragraphs.text: I want to save time and money
I want my business to grow and bring more profit
Ok, I’ve made my mind. Where should I find specialists?
